sight_reading.title: üéπ Continuous Sight Reading
sight_reading.subtitle: Continuous scrolling music reading exercise
sight_reading.midi_info_desc: This exercise works only with an instrument connected via MIDI cable. Play the correct notes on your keyboard when they appear highlighted.
sight_reading.step1: Configure: Choose key signature and note range
sight_reading.step2: Press START: You'll see 8-10 generated notes on the staff
sight_reading.step3: Play the FIRST note (BLUE): The first note is always the one to play
sight_reading.step4: Automatic progress: Correct notes turn gray, the exercise advances immediately
sight_reading.step5: Infinite exercise: Continue until you press STOP
sight_reading.start_prompt: Press START to begin the exercise
